name: workspace_member
description: A user who is a member of a given workspace

attributes.name: workspace_id
attributes.description: The unique identifier of a workspace

attributes.name: keycloak_user_id
attributes.description: The unique identifier of a keycloak user

attributes.name: role
attributes.description: The role assigned to the user in the workspace

attributes.name: inserted_at
attributes.description: The timestamp when the user became a member of the workspace

attributes.name: removed_at
attributes.description: The timestamp when the user was removed as a member of the workspace
